phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...

Kono sora wo daite kagayaku.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare.
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Good morning, Shinji.
How is it going?
No problems.
I am getting used to it.
That is good.
Have you memorized the positions of all the Eva emergence points,
emergency power junctions, armament equipment sites and recovery zones?
I guess so.
Well, let us review it now.
I guess so.
Well, let us review it now.
Normally the Eva runs off electricity provided by an umbilical cable.
In emergencies, it can switch to a built-in battery,
with an active life of one minute at full power,
and no more than five minutes in the minimal activity gain mode.
This is due to our current limits in battery capacity technology.
Do you understand?
Yes.
Do you understand?
Yes.
Now let us continue from where we left off yesterday.
Initiate Induction Mode.
Now let us continue from where we left off yesterday.
Initiate Induction Mode.
Position the target in the center,
then switch on.
Take it easy.
Position the target in the center.
Then pull the switch.
Next!
You know, I wonder why Shinji agreed to be a pilot after what happened?
It would seem that he simply does what he is told to do.
I suppose that is just his way of getting through life.
Target in the center, pull the switch.
Target in the center, pull the switch.
Target in the center, pull the switch.
Target in the center, pull the switch.
Target in the center...
And now, from Tokyo we go to Natsuko Shinohara in Matsuzaki.
Good morning, this is Shinohara.
Guess what?
Today I am in Matsuzaki in West Izu for a little scuba diving!
Today's forecast is sunny, with an estimated high of 32 degrees C.
Miss Misato, it is morning already.
Today's forecast is sunny, with an estimated high of 32 degrees C.
I just got back from night duty.
Spring, Summer, Fall and Winter.
I do not have to go to work until this evening, so please, let me sleep.
Spring, Summer, Fall and Winter.
I do not have to go to work until this evening, so please, let me sleep.
We never see snow these days...
instead, due to the recent warmth,
I see.
I will go.
instead, due to the recent warmth,
We never see snow these days, instead, due to the recent warmth,
aquatic life has been coming back little by little.
Hey, is not today Thursday?
Aquatic life has been coming back little by little.
Hey, is not today Thursday?
As you dive into the sea you can clearly see an abundance of fish.
Take the burnable trash to the garbage, please.
As you dive into the sea you can clearly see an abundance of fish.
As you dive into the sea you can clearly see an abundance of fish.
Yes, Madam.
As you dive into the sea you can clearly see an abundance of fish.
Yes, Madam.
It makes me think of catching some for tonight's dinner.
So, how is school?
It makes me think of catching some for tonight's dinner.
It makes me think of catching some for tonight's dinner.
Fine.
It makes me think of catching some for tonight's dinner.
Oh, okay.
Take care.
It makes me think of catching some for tonight's dinner.
Oh, okay.
Take care.
Although the town brings back sad memories, this is a hot diving spot.
Although the town brings back sad memories, this is a hot diving spot.
I will see you later.
Although the town brings back sad memories, this is a hot diving spot.
Although the town brings back sad memories, this is a hot diving spot.
Yes?
Hello?
Oh, it is you, Ritsuko.
How is it going?
Are you getting along with him?
Him?
Oh, Shinji.
Well, he transferred into school two weeks ago and he has not changed.
No one ever calls him.
Calls him?
Calls him?
Well, since I figured he would be needing one, I gave him a cellular phone.
Well, since I figured he would be needing one, I gave him a cellular phone.
I do not think he is ever used it though, or received any calls.
I am not sure, but I do not think he has any friends.
Well, I would guess that Shinji's not the sort who makes friends easily.
Do you know the fable of the Hedgehog's Dilemma?
Hedgehog?
You mean those animals with the spiny hair?
Even though a hedgehog may wish to become close with another hedgehog,
the closer they get, the more they injure each other with their spines.
It is the same with some humans.
The reason he seems so withdrawn is because he is afraid of being hurt.
Well, he is going to have to learn someday that part of growing up
means finding a way to interact with others while distancing pain.
What is up, class rep?
Did you give him the printout I gave you yesterday?
What?
Well...
Well, there was not anybody home at Toji's place.
Mr. Aida, are not you Mr. Suzuhara's friend?
Are not you worried about him?
Do you suppose he is injured?
What?
In that robot incident?!
The television report said that nobody was injured!
No way, you saw where the explosion was on Mount Takanosu, did not you?
There were fighters scrambled from Iruma and Komatsu,
and there were also troops from Misawa and Kyushu.
I will bet at least ten or twenty people were injured,
and there had to be some killed, too.
Toji!
Suzuhara!
Toji!
Suzuhara!
Wow, has the class population dropped or what?
They have all been evacuated or transferred to other schools.
After all, no one wants to stay after that last battle inside the city.
Yeah, you are probably the only one
who is actually enjoying the chance to see a real war.
Yeah, I am.
And speaking of which, where have you been, Toji?
Why were you absent so long?
Did you get involved in the war?
My little sister did.
She was crushed under a pile of debris.
She survived but she is been in the hospital ever since.
Both my dad and grand-dad are working at the lab,
and there is no way they can leave their posts.
So, if I am not with her, she is all alone.
That robot's pilot was really dumb!
It makes me so angry!
How could he wreck our own city?
What was he doing?
About the pilot, have you heard the rumor about the new transfer student?
What transfer student?
Him, over there.
He transferred here while you were absent.
He came right after the incident.
Do not you think that is odd?
All rise!
And so, humankind was about to face its greatest trial.
In the last year of the 20th century,
a massive meteor from space slammed into the Antarctic continent.
The continent's ice cap was melted almost instantaneously.
The water level of the oceans increased dramatically,
the Earth was thrown off its axis,
and new, devastatingly abnormal, weather patterns were spawned.
The lives of all living things on the planet were threatened.
Several thousand species and half of the world's human population
were lost in the immediate aftermath.
That was the so-called Second Impact.
The survivors still had to live through the hell
of worldwide economic collapse, ethnic conflicts, and civil wars.
of worldwide economic collapse, ethnic conflicts, and civil wars.
However, it has been fifteen years since then.
In only fifteen years, we have restored ourselves.
This is certainly proof of the human race's resilience, but even more so,
This is certainly proof of the human race's resilience, but even more so,
it is the fruit of the blood, sweat and tears
your fathers and mothers have dedicated to this because.
What?!
Really?!
Oh, wow!
Cool!
Really?!
Oh, wow!
Cool!
I lived in Nebukawa at the time, which is underwater now...
Really, the new student was?
I lived in Nebukawa at the time, which is underwater now...
Really, the new student was?
Hey, you guys!
We are still in class, you know!
Sit down now!
Aw, you are always so bossy!
Hey, come on!
Forget her!
Now cut that out!
Hey, come on!
Forget her!
Now cut that out!
Now cut that out!
Cool, it is awesome!
Cool, it is awesome!
Well...
Hey, how were you chosen?
Well...
Hey, how were you chosen?
Were there any tests?
Were not you scared?
Were there any tests?
Were not you scared?
Were not you scared?
What is the cockpit look like?
What is the cockpit look like?
Well, I am not supposed to talk about secret stuff.
Oh, come on!
Do not be mean!
Hey, what is the name of the robot?
I do not know much, but everyone calls it Eva or Unit 01.
Eva?
And what is its ultimate attack mode?
Eva?
And what is its ultimate attack mode?
And what is its ultimate attack mode?
Some kind of vibrating knife.
Some kind of vibrating knife.
An ultra-sonic wave.
That is amazing!
We are so proud of you!
Yeah, right!
Cool!
Yeah.
And thus...
Oh...
That is all for today.
Everybody stand up!
Bow!
That is all for today.
Everybody stand up!
Bow!
Everybody stand up!
Bow!
Where do you live, Ikari?
Hey, you guys, why do not you at least show some manners at the end?
In the older part of the city?
Hey, you guys, why do not you at least show some manners at the end?
Sorry, newcomer, but I have got to beat you up!
I have got to work off my anger.
Sorry, his sister was injured because of the incident.
That is his excuse, anyway.
I did not pilot it by choice.
We have got an emergency call.
I will go.
A special state of emergency has been declared
for the Kanto and Chubu regions surrounding the Tokai district.
All residents must evacuate to their designated shelters immediately.
Repeating: A state of emergency has been declared...
NEON GENESIS EVANGELION
The target has been sighted by our cameras.
It is already penetrated into our territorial waters.
Assume battle stations, level one.
Roger, prepare for anti-aircraft interception.
Tokyo 3 transforming to battle formation.
Initiate accommodation of the central block.
Accommodation of central block
and the first through seventh districts has been completed.
Notification of the government and other related ministries, completed.
Present effective rate of anti-aircraft interception: 48.
What is the status of noncombatants and civilians?
We have already received reports that the evacuation has been completed.
Attention elementary school and junior high school students.
Please form groups with your individual classes.
Not again!
Just text messages again?
Not again!
Just text messages again?
It is news censorship.
They will not show any of it to us civilians.
Even though it is an incredible event.
The fourth Angel would show up while Commander Ikari is away.
It is a lot sooner than we expected.
The last time they gave us a fifteen year break.
This time it is been only three weeks.
They never care about our situation, do they?
They are the type we women hate the most.
It is a waste of the taxpayers' money.
The committee is demanding that we dispatch an Evangelion again.
Oh, they get on my nerves.
If they had not asked for it, I would have mobilized it anyway.
Entry procedure initiated.
LCL oxygenated.
Releasing airlock.
Why am I piloting this thing again, even though my father's not here?
Even though I got beat up?
Hey, I need to talk to you, privately, you know?
What for?
Just give me a second, okay?
What for?
Just give me a second, okay?
Well, okay.
Class rep!
What?
We have both have to go to the bathroom!
What?
We have both have to go to the bathroom!
You were supposed to use the bathroom before you came here.
So, what is this about?
I have got to see it, at least once in my life.
You mean the battle up there?
Nobody knows when the enemy will come the next time.
You mean the battle up there?
Nobody knows when the enemy will come the next time.
Kensuke, are you serious?
If we let this opportunity escape us, we may lose it forever!
Please, help me unlock the gate.
But you could get killed if you go out there.
If we stay here in the shelter, who is to say that the risk is not the same?
If I could be killed anyway, I would rather see it first.
You idiot.
What do you think NERV's for?
And what is NERV's most important weapon?
It is the robot the new kid pilots.
He protected us the other day,
but you hit him pretty hard.
Twice!
If he refuses to fight, we are all going to die.
Does not that make it your obligation to watch him fight?
Okay, you are not leaving me any options!
You will do anything to get what you want, will not you?
Shinji, are you ready?
Yes.
Yes.
First, neutralize the enemy's AT field, then fire a volley.
First, neutralize the enemy's AT field, then fire a volley.
Do it just like we practiced.
Can you handle that?
Yes.
Launch!
Yes.
Launch!
Cool!
All my efforts really paid off!
I have been waiting for this all my life!
Oh!
This is it!
There it is!
The AT field has been deployed.
Target in the center, pull the switch.
Do it just as planned, okay, Shinji?
Target in the center, pull the switch.
Right.
You idiot!
You hid the enemy with your own smoke!
I cannot believe it!
He is already losing!
Not a problem.
I am sending you a spare rifle.
Not a problem.
I am sending you a spare rifle.
Take it!
Shinji?
Hey, Shinji?
Jeez...
Being beaten up must have really messed him up.
Shut up!
The umbilical cable's been snapped off!
Eva has switched to its internal battery power source.
4 minutes, 53 seconds of activation remaining.
It is coming this way!
Shinji, are you all right?
Shinji!
Damage report?
No problems detected.
He can make it.
Damage report?
No problems detected.
He can make it.
Shinji's classmates?
What are they doing there?
Why will not he fight?
Because we are here?
He cannot move because of us!
Activation time remaining: 3 minutes 28 seconds.
Shinji, let them into the cockpit!
Once you have got them, retreat.
We will start again later!
Do you think unauthorized civilians can be allowed into the entry plug?!
I am authorizing it.
You are exceeding your authority, Captain Katsuragi!
I am authorizing it.
You are exceeding your authority, Captain Katsuragi!
Unit 01's remaining activation time: 3 minutes.
Hold Eva on your current commands and eject the entry plug.
Hurry up!
You two!
Get in!
Now!
What the...
It is water?
My camera!
My camera!
Abnormal conditions occurring in the nervous system.
Of course.
It is because you have allowed two foreign bodies into the matrix!
They are being detected as noise in the nerve impulse systems!
Retreat!
Now!
Utilize recovery route 34, retreat to the east side of the mountain.
Hey, new kid, she said, Retreat!
I must not run away.
I must not run away!
New kid?!
I must not run away!
Progressive Knife engaged!
Obey my orders, Shinji!
You have got to retreat!
Shinji!
That idiot...
Unit 01, activation time remaining: 30 seconds!
Eva Unit 01, activation ceased.
The target is completely silent.
It is been three days.
You mean, since we were chewed out?
No, since he stopped coming to school.
Who is he?
The new kid, of course.
Who is he?
The new kid, of course.
I wonder what he is been doing since then?
Are you worried about him?
No, not exactly worried.
Toji, for someone who is so tactless, you are pretty stubborn.
If you had apologized to him back then,
you would not have had to agonize over it for three days.
Here, this is the new kid's phone number.
If you are so worried, why do not you call him?
TO BE CONTINUED...
As the dreary rain pours down,
Shinji, overwhelmed and unable to overcome his weaknesses, runs away from Misato.
The organization brings the aimlessly wandering Shinji back.
There we no kind words.
